snippet.title: My Days with the Demoness - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
A rom-com visual novel which follows a NEET mechanic who accidentally brings the demon lord’s daughter to earth; as not to be indebted to him, she decides to stay with him to improve his “miserable life”; meanwhile he tries his best to fix the portal before time runs out. Will they be successful? 

Steam; https://store.steampowered.com/app/1114640/My_Days_with_the_Demoness/?

Itch; https://tophatstudios.itch.io/my-days-with-the-demoness/

Developed by Blissful Work's and published by Top Hat Studios, Inc.
https://twitter.com/tophatstudiosEN
https://twitter.com/BlissfulWorks

https://tophat.studio
